languages.text: Данная регалия символизирует близость владельца к Лорд-инквизитору, что воодушевляет его соратников и добавляет веса его приказам.

traits.locale_text: Данная регалия гарантирует владельцу помощь Инквизиции, щедро предоставляющей свои ресурсы.

languages.text: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.
languages.original_text: Данная регалия символизирует близость владельца к Лорд-инквизитору, что воодушевляет его соратников и добавляет веса его приказам.

traits.locale_text: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.
This regalia guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition with its wealth of resources.
This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.
This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition with its wealth of resources.
This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.
This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

languages.text: この指輪は、持ち主とロード・インクィジターの関係の深さを表している。持ち主の仲間に力を与えて、彼らの命令に重みを持たせる。
languages.original_text: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

traits.locale_text: この指輪は、持ち主とロード・インクィジターの関係の深さを表している。持ち主の仲間に力を与えて、彼らの命令に重みを持たせる。

languages.text: 这枚戒指象征着持有者与大审判官之间的亲密关系。它的力量会激励持有者同伴，让持有者的命令变得更有分量。
languages.original_text: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

traits.locale_text: 这枚戒指的持有者可以获得审判庭的大量资源。

languages.text: Este anillo simboliza la cercanía de su portador con el Lord Inquisidor, lo que inspira a sus compañeros y da más peso a sus órdenes.
languages.original_text: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

traits.locale_text: Este anillo otorga al portador la ayuda de la Inquisición y sus abundantes recursos.

languages.text: Symbole de la proximité de son propriétaire avec le seigneur inquisiteur, cet anneau galvanise son entourage et ajoute à son autorité.
languages.original_text: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

traits.locale_text: Cet anneau garantit à son porteur de recevoir des ressources de l'Inquisition.

languages.text: Dieser Ring symbolisiert die Nähe seines Trägers zum Großinquisitor, was die Gefährten des Trägers beflügelt und ihren Befehlen Gewicht verleiht.
languages.original_text: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Ring garantiert seinem Besitzer die Unterstützung durch die Inquisition mit all ihren Ressourcen.

languages.text: Bu yüzük, sahibinin Lord Engizisyoncu'ya olan yakınlığını simgeler. Bu da sahibinin yoldaşlarına ilham verip emirlerine ağırlık katar.
languages.original_text: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

traits.locale_text: Bu yüzük, sahibinin Lord Engizisyoncu'ya olan yakınlığını simgeler. Bu da sahibinin yoldaşlarına ilham verir ve emirlerine ağırlık katar.
